generated_text:
- road: The image shows a paved road with white lane markings and crosswalks, which is the primary surface for vehicle movement.
- sidewalk: A sidewalk is visible on the right side of the image, bordered by grass and a curb, designated for pedestrians.
- building: A gray building with windows and decorative elements is visible on the right side of the image.
- vegetation: Trees and bushes are visible along the sides of the road and near the building.
- terrain: Grass and other ground vegetation are visible along the edges of the road and sidewalk.
- sky: The sky is visible above the bridge and trees, appearing overcast.
- person: A person can be seen sitting inside a window of the building on the right.
- car: Two cars are visible on the road, one black SUV and one black sedan, both facing away from the camera.
- pole: Several poles are visible, including traffic light poles and sign poles.
- traffic sign: Traffic signs are visible, including a "No Entry" sign and directional signs on the bridge.
- traffic light: A traffic light is visible on the left side of the image, mounted on a pole.
- motorcycle: A motorcycle is visible parked near the building on the right side.
